undoButton.description: Button to go to previous version

redoButton.description: Button to go to next version

rollbackButton.description: Button to go back to original version

errorLoadingSettings.description: Error message when settings cannot be loaded

apiKeySaved.description: Success message when API key is saved

errorUpdatingStyle.description: Error message when style cannot be updated

errorChangingLanguage.description: Error message when language cannot be changed

errorApiKeyNotConfigured.message: API key not configured. Please configure your API key in settings.
errorApiKeyNotConfigured.description: Error message when API key is not configured

errorApiKeyInvalid.message: Invalid API key. Please check your key.
errorApiKeyInvalid.description: Error message when API key is invalid

errorApiKeyEncryption.description: Error message when encrypting the key

errorApiKeyDecryption.description: Error message when decrypting the key

errorApiKeyFormat.description: Error message when key format is incorrect

errorRateLimit.message: Rate limit reached. Please try again later.

errorNetwork.message: Network error. Please check your connection.

professionalPrompt.message: Reformulate this text professionally while keeping the original meaning:

professionalSystem.message: You are a professional communication expert. Your task is to reformulate the text in a clear, precise and professional manner while maintaining the original message.

casualPrompt.message: Reformulate this text in a casual and natural way:

casualSystem.message: You are a casual communication expert. Your task is to reformulate the text in a natural and accessible way while maintaining the original message.

formalPrompt.message: Reformulate this text in a formal and sophisticated manner:

formalSystem.message: You are a formal communication expert. Your task is to reformulate the text in an elegant and sophisticated style while maintaining the original message.

tinyMCESystemInstructions.message: The [NEWLINE] tag represents a line break. For each line break occurrence, regardless of context, it is MANDATORY to explicitly insert the [NEWLINE] tag at that location. If the tag is already present, it must remain intact and be rewritten as is in the text. No line break should exist without the presence of the [NEWLINE] tag.
tinyMCESystemInstructions.description: System instructions for TinyMCE regarding line breaks

contextMenuUndo.description: Context menu option to go back

contextMenuRedo.description: Context menu option to go forward

contextMenuRollback.description: Context menu option to go back to original

errorTinyMCEInit.message: TinyMCE editor must be initialized with a textarea element

errorTooManyAttempts.message: Too many attempts. Please wait before trying again.
errorTooManyAttempts.description: Error message for too many attempts

errorKeyUnavailable.message: API key is no longer available
errorKeyUnavailable.description: Error message for unavailable API key
